controller

Class GifCreatorController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.GifCreatorController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class GifCreatorController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    Controller class for gifCreator.fxml. Creates a GIF based on the current live game board which is deep copied upon instantiating this class. Input fields let's the user manipulate parameters for the gif and a preview of the GIF is displayed.

      • GifCreatorController

        GifCreatorController(Board gameBoard)
        Contructor does a deep copy of the game board. This board can be manipulated without affecting the live game board.
        Parameters:
        gameBoard - the current live game board

        private boolean inputGenCount(boolean ok)

        Parameters:
        ok - control variable
        Returns:
        boolean as is if input passes regex, false if not

      • inputPathFromFileChooser

        public static boolean inputPathFromFileChooser(boolean ok)
        Set the filepath for saving the GIF at users wanted location. User interaction through FileChooser.
        Parameters:
        ok - control variable
        Returns:
        boolean as is if file path is created, false if not

      • createGifEvent

        public void createGifEvent()
        Create a GIF. This is done by applying input data from GUI, creating a GIFWriter object, writing to .gif file through use of GIFWriter and logic in model.GifCreator. Finally feedback is provided to user and stage closed.

      • cancelGifEvent

        public void cancelGifEvent()
        Close the GIF creator without making a GIF
